languages.text: "Анализ систем безопасности указал, что //убийцы//еретики// проникли в реликварий, используя уникальный код идентификации технобрата Тарзуса. Кто-то совершил //кражу//дублирование// личности брата Тарзуса, что является грехом третьей степени. И единица, предположительно преступно определяющая себя как Паскаль Ханейманн, уличена в использовании/введении украденного кода".

"Analysis of the security system showed that the //assassins//heretics// infiltrated the reliquary using Tech-Brother Tarzus's unique identification code. Someone had //stolen//duplicated// Brother Tarzus's identity, which is a Grade Three transgression. And the unit making the allegedly criminal claim of being Pasqal Haneumann is known to have previously //used//entered// the stolen code."
languages.original_text: "Анализ систем безопасности указал, что //убийцы//еретики// проникли в реликварий, используя уникальный код идентификации технобрата Тарзуса. Кто-то совершил //кражу//дублирование// личности брата Тарзуса, что является грехом третьей степени. И единица, предположительно преступно определяющая себя как Паскаль Ханейманн, уличена в использовании/введении украденного кода".

Someone had //stolen//duplicated// Brother Tarzus's identity, which is a third-degree sin. And the unit making the allegedly criminal claim of being Pasqal Haneumann is known to have previously used/entered the stolen code."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: 「セキュリティシステムの解析で、//アサシン//異端者//が技術同胞ターザス固有の識別コードを使って聖骨箱に侵入しようとしたことが分かった。誰かが同胞ターザスの身分を//盗難//複製//した。これは第3級の違反だ。そしてユニットが犯罪容疑をかけているパスカル・ヘニュマンは以前に盗難コードを//使用//入力//したことがあると判明している」
languages.original_text: "Analysis of the security system showed that the //assassins//heretics// infiltrated the reliquary using Tech-Brother Tarzus's unique identification code. Someone had //stolen//duplicated// Brother Tarzus's identity, which is a Grade Three transgression. And the unit making the allegedly criminal claim of being Pasqal Haneumann is known to have previously //used//entered// the stolen code."

traits.locale_text: 「セキュリティシステムの解析で、//アサシン//異端者//が技術同胞ターザス固有の識別コードを使って聖骨箱に侵入しようとしたことが分かった。誰かが同胞ターザスの身分を//盗難//複製//した。これは第3級の違反だ。そしてユニットが犯罪容疑をかけているパスカル・ヘニュマンは以前に盗難コードを//使用//入力//したことがあると判明している」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “安全系统的分析结果表明，//刺客//异端分子//利用了塔祖斯兄弟唯一的身份识别代码，侵入了圣骨库。有人//盗用//窃取//复制//了塔祖斯兄弟的身份，这种行为属于第三级违法行为，而声称自己是帕斯卡·哈努曼的犯罪单位此前//使用过//输入过//被窃取的识别代码。”
languages.original_text: "Analysis of the security system showed that the //assassins//heretics// infiltrated the reliquary using Tech-Brother Tarzus's unique identification code. Someone had //stolen//duplicated// Brother Tarzus's identity, which is a Grade Three transgression. And the unit making the allegedly criminal claim of being Pasqal Haneumann is known to have previously //used//entered// the stolen code."

traits.locale_text: “安全系统的分析结果表明，//刺客//异端分子//利用了塔祖斯兄弟唯一的身份识别代码，侵入了圣骨库。有人//盗用//窃取//复制//了塔祖斯兄弟的身份，这种行为属于第三级违法行为，而声称自己是帕斯卡·哈努曼的犯罪单位此前//使用过//输入过//被窃取的识别代码。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Die Analyse des Sicherheitssystems zeigte, dass die //Attentäter//Ketzer// mit Tech-Bruder Tarzus' einzigartigem Identifikationscode in das Reliquiar eingedrungen sind. Jemand hatte Bruder Tarzus' Identität //gestohlen//dupliziert//, was einem Verstoß dritten Grades entspricht. Und die Einheit, die mutmaßlich illegal behauptet, Pasqal Haneumann zu sein, hat schon früher gestohlenen Code //benutzt//eingegeben//."
languages.original_text: "Analysis of the security system showed that the //assassins//heretics// infiltrated the reliquary using Tech-Brother Tarzus's unique identification code. Someone had //stolen//duplicated// Brother Tarzus's identity, which is a Grade Three transgression. And the unit making the allegedly criminal claim of being Pasqal Haneumann is known to have previously //used//entered// the stolen code."

traits.locale_text: "Die Analyse des Sicherheitssystems zeigte, dass die //Attentäter//Ketzer// mit Tech-Bruder Tarzus' einzigartigem Identifikationscode in das Reliquiar eingedrungen sind. Jemand hatte Bruder Tarzus' Identität //gestohlen//dupliziert//, was einem Verstoß dritten Grades entspricht. Und die Einheit, die angeblich illegal behauptet, Pasqal Haneumann zu sein, hat schon früher gestohlenen Code //benutzt//eingegeben//."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « L'analyse du système de sécurité indique que les //assassins//hérétiques// ont infiltré le reliquaire à l'aide du code d'identification unique du technofrère Tarzus. Quelqu'un a //usurpé//contrefait// son identité, ce qui constitue une infraction de troisième catégorie. Or, l'unité présumée coupable de chercher à se faire passer pour Pasqal Haneumann a été formellement identifiée comme l'individu ayant précédemment //utilisé//saisi// le code volé. »
languages.original_text: "Analysis of the security system showed that the //assassins//heretics// infiltrated the reliquary using Tech-Brother Tarzus's unique identification code. Someone had //stolen//duplicated// Brother Tarzus's identity, which is a Grade Three transgression. And the unit making the allegedly criminal claim of being Pasqal Haneumann is known to have previously //used//entered// the stolen code."

traits.locale_text: « L'analyse du système de sécurité indique que les //assassins//hérétiques// ont infiltré le reliquaire à l'aide du code d'identification unique du technofrère Tarzus. Quelqu'un a //usurpé//contrefait// son identité, ce qui constitue une infraction de troisième catégorie. Or, l'unité présumée coupable de chercher à se faire passer pour Pasqal Haneumann a été formellement identifiée comme l'individu ayant précédemment utilisé/saisi le code volé. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «El análisis del sistema de seguridad ha revelado que los //asesinos//herejes// se infiltraron en el relicario empleando el código de identificación exclusivo del tecnohermano Tarzus. Alguien había //robado//usurpado// la identidad del hermano Tarzus, lo cual constituye una transgresión de grado tres. Y existe constancia de que la unidad presuntamente criminal que afirma ser Pasqal Haneumann ha //utilizado//introducido// previamente el código robado».
languages.original_text: "Analysis of the security system showed that the //assassins//heretics// infiltrated the reliquary using Tech-Brother Tarzus's unique identification code. Someone had //stolen//duplicated// Brother Tarzus's identity, which is a Grade Three transgression. And the unit making the allegedly criminal claim of being Pasqal Haneumann is known to have previously //used//entered// the stolen code."

traits.locale_text: «El análisis del sistema de seguridad ha revelado que los //asesinos//herejes// se infiltraron en el relicario empleando el código de identificación exclusivo del tecnohermano Tarzus. Alguien había //robado//usurpado// la identidad del hermano Tarzus, lo cual constituye una transgresión de tercer grado. Y existe constancia de que la unidad presuntamente criminal que afirma ser Pasqal Haneumann ha utilizado/introducido previamente el código robado».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Güvenlik sisteminin analizi, //suikastçıların//kâfirlerin//, kutsal emanet odasına Tekno Kardeş Tarzus'un eşsiz kimlik saptama kodunu kullanarak sızdıklarını göstermekte. Birileri Kardeş Tarzus'un kimliğini //çalmış//kopyalamış//. Bu da Üçüncü Kademe bir suç anlamına gelmekte. Pasqal Haneumann olduğunu iddia etmekle suçlanan birimin, çalınan kodu daha önce //kullandığı//girdiği// bilinmektedir."
languages.original_text: "Analysis of the security system showed that the //assassins//heretics// infiltrated the reliquary using Tech-Brother Tarzus's unique identification code. Someone had //stolen//duplicated// Brother Tarzus's identity, which is a Grade Three transgression. And the unit making the allegedly criminal claim of being Pasqal Haneumann is known to have previously //used//entered// the stolen code."

traits.locale_text: "Güvenlik sisteminin analizi, //suikastçıların//kâfirlerin//, kutsal emanet odasına Tekno Kardeş Tarzus'un eşsiz kimlik saptama kodunu kullanarak sızdıklarını göstermekte. Birileri Tarzus Kardeş'in kimliğini //çalmış//kopyalamış// ve bu da Üçüncü Kademe bir suç anlamına gelmekte. Pasqal Haneumann olduğunu iddia etme potansiyel suçunu işleyen birimin, çalınan kodu daha önce //kullandığı//girdiği// bilinmektedir."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
